title: Unkown Error
body: Today when I tried to join League Of Legends, i got a error while entering my creentials . It says something like this  : An unknown error has occurred

replies.body:
Since this happens at the login screen, this may be caused by Internet Explorer security settings, which League relies on. I recommend working through the common solutions for this listed in our [login issues guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)

Let me know if that guide resolved your issue.
